<!-- DO NOT EDIT! This file was auto-generated by crates/build/re_types_builder/src/codegen/docs/mod.rs -->

A single dimension within a multi-dimensional tensor.

## Fields
#### `size`
Type: `uint64`

The length of this dimension.

#### `name`
Type: nullable `utf8`

The name of this dimension, e.g. "width", "height", "channel", "batch', ….


## Arrow datatype
```
Struct {
    size: uint64
    name: nullable utf8
}
```
